def home(request): return render(request, 'home.html', {'functions': functions, 'page': 'Home'})
def about(request): return render(request, 'about.html', {'functions': functions, 'page': 'About'})

class Function(models.Model):
    page = models.CharField(max_length=50)
    function_name = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    description = models.TextField()
    required = models.BooleanField(default=False)

13.code:
from django.urls import path
from . import views
urlpatterns = [
    path('', views.home, name='home'),
    path('customer_management/', views.customer_management, name='customer_management'),
    path('product_management/', views.product_management, name='product_management'),
    path('purchase_records/', views.purchase_records, name='purchase_records'),
    path('preferred_products/', views.preferred_products, name='preferred_products'),
    path('sales_analysis/', views.sales_analysis, name='sales_analysis')
]

from django.db import models

class Customer(models.Model):
    name = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    birthday = models.DateField()
    age = models.IntegerField()
    sex = models.CharField(max_length=1)
    company = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    phone_number = models.CharField(max_length=15)

    def __str__(self):
        return self.name


class Product(models.Model):
    name = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    category = models.CharField(max_length=50)
    recommended_price = models.DecimalField(max_digits=8, decimal_places=2)

    def __str__(self):
        return self.name


class PurchaseRecord(models.Model):
    datetime = models.DateTimeField()
    product = models.ForeignKey(Product, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    customer = models.ForeignKey(Customer, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    quantity = models.IntegerField()
    amount = models.DecimalField(max_digits=10, decimal_places=2)

    def __str__(self):
        return f'{self.customer} - {self.product} - {self.datetime}'


class PreferredProduct(models.Model):
    customer = models.ForeignKey(Customer, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    product = models.ForeignKey(Product, on_delete=models.CASCADE)

    def __str__(self):
        return f'{self.customer} - {self.product}'
Customer Management
Product Management
Purchase Records
Preferred Products Management
Sales Analysis
